title: Anticoagulation activity of sulfated carboxymethyl cellulose/Azadirachta indica leaf powder-based bio-composite
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22017-22027
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02893G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Khalid A. Alamry, Mahmoud A. Hussein, Ajahar Khan, Abdullah M. Asiri
The eco-friendly and non-toxic behavior of polymeric bio-composites based on S-CMC, synthesized utilizing natural herbs (Azadirachta indica leaf powder), has shown an interesting anticoagulant activity against diverse physical and chemical actions.
